trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object using the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> objekt med det angitte elementet indeks, radtypen og rad tilstand.

trans-unit.source: The CreateRow method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object used to represent a row within the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateRow er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen til å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet brukes til å representere en rad i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item to display.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for dataelementet skal vises.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> with the specified item index, row type, and row state.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> med det angitte elementet indeks, radtypen og rad tilstand.

trans-unit.source: Creates the containing table for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter innholdstabellen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The CreateTable method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create a table that acts as the container for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden CreateTable er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen for å opprette en tabell som fungerer som beholder for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"></xref> that represents the containing table for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Table"> </xref> som representerer innholdstabellen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current data-entry mode of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter gjeldende dataregistrering modus for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the CurrentMode property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit, insert, or read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Bruk CurrentMode-egenskapen for å finne ut om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i Rediger, innsetting eller skrivebeskyttet modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser verdiene annen modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormView.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| This value is normally set automatically by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the New, Update, Insert, Delete, or Cancel command button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `FormViewMode.Edit`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, som tillater brukeren å oppdatere verdiene i en oppføring. | | `FormViewMode.Insert`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollen er i insert-modus, som tillater brukeren å legge til en ny post i datakilden. | | `FormView.ReadOnly`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus som normal visningsmodus. | Denne verdien settes vanligvis automatisk ved den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når den ny, oppdatering, innsetting, slette eller Avbryt kommandoen ble brukt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes in response to an action, the events in the following table are raised.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen endrer modi som svar på en handling, aktiveres hendelser i følgende tabell.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to create a custom event handler that performs the appropriate routine when the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg opprette en egendefinert hendelsesbehandling utfører den riktige rutinen når hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>|Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes, but after the mode changes.
trans-unit.target: | Hendelsen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>| Forekommer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen endrer modi, men etter modus endringene.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to perform a task whenever the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>|Occurs when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control changes modes, but before the mode changes.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å utføre en når kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>endres modi. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>| Forekommer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen endrer modi, men før endringene modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This event is commonly used to cancel the mode change.| **Note** These events are not raised when you change the mode programmatically by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen brukes vanligvis til å avbryte endringen. | **Obs** disse hendelsene ikke aktiveres når du endrer modus programmatisk ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ChangeMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Binds the data source to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Datakilden for binding av <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataBind method to bind data from a data source to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk metoden Databinde til å binde data fra en datakilde for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This method resolves all data-binding expressions in the active template of the control.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden løser alle databinding uttrykk i den aktive malen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter dataelementet bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItem property to access the data item bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen DataItem tilgang til dataelementet er bundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The data item is often used to access the field values of the current record directly.
trans-unit.target: Dataelementet brukes ofte tilgang feltverdiene i oppføringen til gjeldende direkte.

trans-unit.source: The type of the <xref:System.Object> returned by this property varies depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: Typen for den <xref:System.Object>returneres av denne egenskapen varierer avhengig av datakilden.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: For example, when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> object is returned.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel, når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen er bundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll, en <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is available only after data binding has occurred.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen er bare tilgjengelig når databinding oppstod.

trans-unit.source: Before data binding occurs, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Før data binding oppstår, denne egenskapen returnerer `null`.

trans-unit.source: This property is also not applicable when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode and returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er heller ikke gjelder når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i insert-modus, og returnerer `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the data item bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer dataelementet bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of data items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall dataelementer i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItemCount property to determine the number of data items contained in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataItemCount-egenskapen til å finne ut hvor mange elementer i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: This property contains the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen inneholder den samme verdien som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of data items in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the data item bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter indeksen for dataelementet bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataItemIndex property to determine the index of the data item bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av DataItemIndex til å fastslå indeksen for dataelementet bundet til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property contains the same value as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen inneholder den samme verdien som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is not applicable when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne egenskapen er ikke tilgjengelig når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When the control is in insert mode, the DataItemIndex property returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Når kontrollen i insert-modus, returnerer egenskapen DataItemIndex -1.

trans-unit.source: The index of the data item bound to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen for dataelementet bundet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object that represents the primary key of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref> objektet som representerer primærnøkkelen for posten som vises.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that contains the key/value pairs of the field or fields listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property for the current record.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt som inneholder nøkkel/verdi-par med feltet eller feltene som er oppført i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>for gjeldende posten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKey property to get this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DataKey-egenskapen for å få tilgang til <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used to obtain the keys and their corresponding values for the fields specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å hente nøklene og deres tilsvarende verdier for feltene som er angitt i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > As a shortcut, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.SelectedValue%2A> property to determine the value of the first key field listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Som en snarvei du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.SelectedValue%2A>til å fastslå verdien for det første nøkkelfeltet som er oppført i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.SelectedValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"></xref> object that represents the primary key of the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey"> </xref> objektet som representerer primærnøkkelen for posten som vises.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the key fields for the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise som inneholder navnene på feltene i for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the DataKeyNames property to specify a comma-separated list of field names that represent the primary key of the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen DataKeyNames til å angi en kommadelt liste over feltnavnene som representerer primærnøkkelen for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the DataKeyNames property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that contains the key/value pairs of the field or fields listed in the DataKeyNames property for the current record.
trans-unit.target: Når egenskapen DataKeyNames angis, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt som inneholder nøkkel/verdi-par med feltet eller feltene som er angitt i egenskapen DataKeyNames for oppføringen til gjeldende.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object is then stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>deretter er lagret i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You must set the DataKeyNames property for the built-in updating, deleting, and inserting features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to work.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Må du angi DataKeyNames-egenskapen for innebygde oppdatering, sletting og innsetting for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen ikke virker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: An array that contains the names of the key fields for the data source.
trans-unit.target: En matrise som inneholder navnene på feltene i for datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data-entry mode to which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control returns after an update, insert, or cancel operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir dataregistrering modus som i <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen returnerer etter en oppdatering, innsetting eller avbryte operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Use the DefaultMode property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to edit, insert, or read-only mode after an update, insert, or cancel operation is performed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DefaultMode-egenskapen til å angi om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen returnerer til Rediger, innsetting eller skrivebeskyttet modus etter en oppdatering, innsetting eller Avbryt operasjonen utføres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to read-only mode; however, you can keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit or insert mode by setting this property to the appropriate value.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen returnerer til skrivebeskyttet modus; du kan imidlertid beholde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll i Rediger eller Sett inn-modus ved å angi denne egenskapen til den passende verdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different mode values.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser verdiene annen modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`FormViewMode.Edit`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode, which allows the user to update the values of a record.| |`FormViewMode.Insert`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, which allows the user to add a new record to the data source.| |`FormViewMode.ReadOnly`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode, which is the normal display mode.| This property is commonly used when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has a single purpose, such as only to insert or edit records.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Beskrivelse | |----------|-----------------| | `FormViewMode.Edit`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, som tillater brukeren å oppdatere verdiene i en oppføring. | | `FormViewMode.Insert`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollen er i insert-modus, som tillater brukeren å legge til en ny post i datakilden. | | `FormViewMode.ReadOnly`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus som normal visningsmodus. | Denne egenskapen er vanligvis brukes når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll med ett enkelt formål som bare å sette inn eller redigere poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_FormViewMode.ReadOnly" name="FormViewMode.ReadOnly" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_FormViewMode.ReadOnly" name="FormViewMode.ReadOnly" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte verdien er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode"> </xref> nummereringsverdier.

trans-unit.source: Deletes the current record in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Sletter gjeldende oppføring i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen fra datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Use the DeleteItem method to programmatically delete the current record in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control from the data source.
trans-unit.target: Bruk DeleteItem-metoden til å slette programmatisk gjeldende oppføring i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to delete the current record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du må slette oppføringen til gjeldende fra utenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollere, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden også hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en sletting.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en sletting.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for an item in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte innholdet for et element i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen gjengir en annen mal for dataraden basert på gjeldende modus for kontrollen (angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which template is used for each mode.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser malen som brukes for hver modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |Edit|EditItemTemplate| |Insert|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| |Read-only|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| Use the EditItemTemplate property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Malen gjengis | |----------|-----------------------| | Rediger | EditItemTemplate | | Sett inn | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| | Skrivebeskyttet | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| Bruk EditItemTemplate-egenskapen til å definere din egen brukergrensesnittet (UI) for datatypen rad når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The edit item template usually contains the input controls for the user to update the values of an existing record, as well as command buttons to update the record and to cancel the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Rediger elementet malen inneholder vanligvis inndata kontroller for brukeren å oppdatere verdiene i en eksisterende post, i tillegg til kommandoknappene å oppdatere oppføringen, og for å avbryte oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template, first place `<EditItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Angi egendefinert mal, utgangspunktet `<EditItemTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EditItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<EditItemTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan knytte et felt ved hjelp av et uttrykk som toveis binding til en kontroll som inndata.

trans-unit.source: This allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to automatically display the original field value in the associated input control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen skal vises automatisk opprinnelige feltverdien i den tilknyttede inndataene kontrollen i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When a record is updated, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically extracts the updated field value from the associated input control.
trans-unit.target: Når en post blir oppdatert, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen trekker automatisk ut oppdaterte feltverdien fra den tilknyttede inndataene kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon på toveis binding uttrykk [Binding til databaser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).

trans-unit.source: To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and update operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette kommandoknapper som utfører innebygde Avbryt og oppdateringsoperasjoner, Legg til en kommando for knappekontrollen en mal med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til en av verdiene som vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |Command button type|CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |Cancel|"Cancel"| |Update|"Update"| You can control the appearance of the item template by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Kommandotypen knappen | Verdien for kommandonavn | |-------------------------|-----------------------| | Avbryt | " Avbryt "| | Oppdateringen | " Oppdateringen "| Du kan kontrollere utseendet av malen elementet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the data row when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder det egendefinerte innholdet for datatypen rad når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data row when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til dataene rad når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Use the EditRowStyle property to control the appearance of the data row when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EditRowStyle-egenskapen til styrer utseendet av dataene rad når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, dataraden viser innholdet brukerdefinerte angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `EditRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EditRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<EditRowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `EditRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data row when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for rad når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row displayed when the data source bound to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til tom dataraden vises når datakilden er bundet til en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataRowStyle property to control the appearance of the empty data row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EmptyDataRowStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet av tom dataraden i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `EmptyDataRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<EmptyDataRowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `EmptyDataRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that allows you to set the appearance of the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som lar deg angi utseendet av tom dataraden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en brukerdefinert innholdet for tom dataraden gjengis når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde som ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by using the EmptyDataTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for den tomme dataraden ved hjelp av egenskapen EmptyDataTemplate.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the empty data row, first place `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for tom dataraden først plasseres `<EmptyDataTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<EmptyDataTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<EmptyDataTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen på tom dataraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the built-in UI for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan eventuelt bruke innebygde Brukergrensesnittet for tom dataraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A> and EmptyDataTemplate properties are set, the EmptyDataTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>og EmptyDataTemplate egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres egenskapen EmptyDataTemplate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for den tomme dataraden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the empty data row rendered when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is bound to a data source that does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden gjengis når en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til en datakilde som ikke inneholder noen poster.

trans-unit.source: The empty data row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the data source that is bound to the control does not contain any records.
trans-unit.target: Tom dataraden vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen ikke inneholder noen poster.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the EmptyDataText property to specify the text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk EmptyDataText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the empty data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen på tom dataraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the empty data row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan alternativt definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for den tomme dataraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the EmptyDataText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge EmptyDataText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the empty data row.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i tom dataraden.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en validerer kontroll håndterer unntak som oppstår under innsetting eller oppdater operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a validator control will handle exceptions that occur during insert or update operations; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en validerer kontroll håndterer unntak som oppstår under Sett inn eller oppdatere operasjoner. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Makes certain that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is bound to data when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Gjør visse som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er bundet til data om nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method is a helper method used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> class to make certain that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is bound to data when appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EnsureDataBound er helper metode som brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>klassen for å kontroller at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er bundet til data om nødvendig.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The EnsureDataBound method is usually called during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A> method to bind the control to the data source when the data-bound control is not yet bound, but requires data binding.
trans-unit.target: Metoden EnsureDataBound kalles vanligvis under den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A>metoden å binde kontrollen til datakilden når databundet kontrollen ikke er bundet, men krever databinding.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.OnPreRender%2A>

trans-unit.source: This version of the method has been overridden to prevent data binding from occurring when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne versjonen av metoden har overstyrt for å forhindre databinding oppstår når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the values of each field declared within the data row and stores them in the specified <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Henter verdier for hvert felt som er deklarert i dataraden og lagrer dem i den angitte <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The ExtractRowValues method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to retrieve the values of each field declared within the data row.
trans-unit.target: Metoden ExtractRowValues er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen for å hente verdiene for hvert felt som er deklarert i dataraden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Because the data row displays a different template based on the current mode, this method retrieves only the field values declared in the template that corresponds to the current mode.
trans-unit.target: Siden dataraden viser en annen mal basert på gjeldende modus, henter denne metoden bare feltverdiene deklarert i malen som samsvarer med gjeldende modus.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the available modes and the corresponding templates.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser modi som er tilgjengelig og tilhørende malene.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Template| |----------|--------------| |Insert|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| |Edit|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| |Read-only|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| You can specify whether the extracted values include the key field or fields by using the `includeKeys` parameter.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Malen | |----------|--------------| | Sett inn | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| | Rediger | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| | Skrivebeskyttet | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| Du kan angi om utpakkede verdier inkluderer felt eller felt ved hjelp av den `includeKeys` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> used to store the field values of the current data item.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> brukes til å lagre feltverdiene fra gjeldende dataelement.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include key fields; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>inkludere nøkkelfelt; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer bunntekst rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekstraden vises nederst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the footer row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet som representerer bunntekstraden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The FooterRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control creates the footer row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I FooterRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppretter bunntekst rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the footer row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk bunntekstraden for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the FooterRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control overwrites any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen FooterRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen overskriver endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for bunntekstraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> that represents the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> som representerer bunntekst rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til bunntekstraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekstraden vises nederst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterStyle property to control the appearance of the footer row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til bunntekstraden i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `FooterStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<FooterStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<FooterStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `FooterStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen på bunnteksten rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the footer row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en brukerdefinert innholdet for bunntekstraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> or FooterTemplate property is set.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekstraden vises nederst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>eller FooterTemplate-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by using the FooterTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for bunntekstrad ved hjelp av egenskapen FooterTemplate.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the footer row, first place `<FooterTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for bunntekstraden først plasseres `<FooterTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<FooterTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<FooterTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for bunntekstraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can simply display text in the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du ganske enkelt å vise tekst i bunntekstraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> and FooterTemplate properties are set, the FooterTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>og FooterTemplate egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres egenskapen FooterTemplate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the footer row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for bunntekstraden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the footer row of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises i bunntekstraden for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The footer row is displayed at the bottom of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the FooterText or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Bunntekstraden vises nederst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når FooterText eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the FooterText property to specify the text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk FooterText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i bunntekstraden.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the footer row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for bunntekstraden i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the footer row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for bunntekstraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the FooterText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge FooterText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the footer row.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i bunntekstraden.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the gridline style for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir rutenettstilen for en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the GridLines property to specify the gridline style for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk rutenettlinjene-egenskapen til å angi rutenett-stil for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available styles.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser tilgjengelige stiler.

trans-unit.source: |Style|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |`GridLines.None`|No gridlines are displayed.| |`GridLines.Horizontal`|Displays the horizontal gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Vertical`|Displays the vertical gridlines only.| |`GridLines.Both`|Displays both the horizontal and vertical gridlines.|
trans-unit.target: | Stilen | Beskrivelse | |-----------|-----------------| | `GridLines.None`| Ingen rutenettlinjene skal vises. | | `GridLines.Horizontal`| Viser de vannrette rutenettlinjene. | | `GridLines.Vertical`| Viser de loddrette rutenettlinjene. | | `GridLines.Both`| Viser både vannrette og loddrette rutenettlinjene. |

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.None" name="GridLines.None" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_GridLines.None" name="GridLines.None" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Overskriftsraden vises øverst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the header row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HeaderRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet som representerer overskriftsraden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The HeaderRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control creates the header row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I HeaderRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppretter overskriftsrad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the header row, for example, when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk overskriftsraden, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the HeaderRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has been rendered; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control overwrites any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen HeaderRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er gjengitte; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen overskriver endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> that represents the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> som representerer overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderStyle property to control the appearance of the header row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HeaderStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til overskriftsrad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `HeaderStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<HeaderStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<HeaderStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `HeaderStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user-defined content for the header row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en brukerdefinert innholdet for overskriftsrad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> or HeaderTemplate property is set.
trans-unit.target: Overskriftsraden vises øverst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>eller HeaderTemplate-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the header row by using the HeaderTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi en egendefinert brukergrensesnittet (UI) for overskriftsraden ved hjelp av egenskapen HeaderTemplate.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the header row, first place `<HeaderTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for overskriftsraden først plasseres `<HeaderTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<HeaderTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<HeaderTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for overskriftsraden den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can simply display text in the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Alternativt kan du ganske enkelt å vise tekst i overskriftsraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> and HeaderTemplate properties are set, the HeaderTemplate property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>og HeaderTemplate egenskapene er angitt, prioriteres egenskapen HeaderTemplate.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the header row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder egendefinerte innholdet for overskriftsraden.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text to display in the header row of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir teksten som skal vises i overskriftsraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The header row is displayed at the top of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the HeaderText or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Overskriftsraden vises øverst i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når HeaderText eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>-egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Use the HeaderText property to specify the text to display in the header row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HeaderText-egenskapen til å angi teksten som skal vises i overskriftsraden.

trans-unit.source: To control the style of the header row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å kontrollere stilen for overskriftsraden den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderStyle%2A>
