trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can define your own custom user interface (UI) for the header row by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property instead of this property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan alternativt definere dine egne egendefinerte brukergrensesnittet (UI) for overskriftsraden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen i stedet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the HeaderText and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge HeaderText og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapene er angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen prioriteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The text to display in the header row.
trans-unit.target: Teksten som skal vises i overskriftsraden.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng (""), noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir vannrett justering av en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontroll på siden.

trans-unit.source: Use the HorizontalAlign property to specify the horizontal alignment of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control within the page.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HorizontalAlign-egenskapen til å angi vannrett justering av en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different horizontal alignment styles.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser annen vannrett justering stiler.

trans-unit.source: |HorizontalAlign value|Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |`HorizontalAlign.NotSet`|The horizontal alignment of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has not been set.| |`HorizontalAlign.Left`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is left-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Center`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is centered on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Right`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is right-aligned on the page.| |`HorizontalAlign.Justify`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is aligned with both the left and right margins of the page.|
trans-unit.target: | Verdien for HorizontalAlign | Beskrivelse | |---------------------------|-----------------| | `HorizontalAlign.NotSet`| Vannrett justering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er ikke angitt. | | `HorizontalAlign.Left`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollen er venstrejustert på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Center`| Kontrollen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>midt på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Right`| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollen er høyrejustert på siden. | | `HorizontalAlign.Justify`| Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er justert med både venstre og høyre Marge av siden. |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HorizontalAlign"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_HorizontalAlign.NotSet" name="HorizontalAlign.NotSet" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates the pager row for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter personsøker raden for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The InitializePager method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create the pager row.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializePager er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen til å opprette raden personsøker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object that contains the navigation controls using the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> object contained in the `pagedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den oppretter en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>objekt som inneholder de Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises ved hjelp av egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource>objekt i den `pagedDataSource` parameteren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell>

trans-unit.source: The cell is then added to the row specified by the `row` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Cellen legges deretter til i raden angitt av den `row` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> that contains the pager row.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> som inneholder raden personsøker.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"></xref> that contains the data for the current page.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagedDataSource"> </xref> som inneholder data for gjeldende side.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: The InitializeRow method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to initialize the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden InitializeRow er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen ikke den angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object is initialized based on the row type and row state specified by its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>-objektet er initialisert basert på radtypen og rad tilstand som er angitt av sin <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The appropriate content is then added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object.
trans-unit.target: Det nødvendige innholdet legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how each row type is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor beskriver hvordan hver radtype er initialisert.

trans-unit.source: |Row type|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |Data row|The contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> property.| |Empty data row|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A> property or the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, depending on which property is set.
trans-unit.target: | Radtypen | Beskrivelse | |--------------|-----------------| | Datarad | Innholdet i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>-egenskapen er lagt til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>-objekt, avhengig av verdien for egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A>. | | Tom dataraden | Verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A>egenskapen, eller innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>egenskapen legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet, avhengig av hvilken egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow.RowState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.| |Footer row|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> property or the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, depending on which property is set.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge egenskapene er angitt, egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>prioriteres. | | Bunntekstrad | Verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A>egenskapen, eller innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>egenskapen legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet, avhengig av hvilken egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EmptyDataTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.| |Header row|The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> property or the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object, depending on which property is set.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge egenskapene er angitt, egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>prioriteres. | | Overskriftsraden | Verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A>egenskapen, eller innholdet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>egenskapen legges til i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet, avhengig av hvilken egenskap er satt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A> property takes precedence.| > [!NOTE] > This method does not initialize the pager row.
trans-unit.target: Hvis begge egenskapene er angitt, egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>prioriteres. | > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden ikke initialisere raden personsøker.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To create the pager row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette raden personsøker, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InitializePager%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> to initialize.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> ikke initialisert.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Setter inn oppføringen til gjeldende i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, use the InsertItem method to programmatically insert the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i insert-modus ved å bruke metoden InsertItem programmatisk sette inn oppføringen til gjeldende i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to insert the current record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du trenger å sette inn oppføringen til gjeldende fra utenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollere, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control must be in insert mode when this method is called; otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen må være i insert-modus når denne metoden er kall; ellers, en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the insert operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi om siden valideringen utføres før innsettingen, kan du bruke den `causesValidation` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden også hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform page validation when the method is called; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å utføre siden når metoden kalles; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is not in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is null.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for an item in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte innholdet for et element i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen gjengir en annen mal for dataraden basert på gjeldende modus for kontrollen (angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which template is used for each mode.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser malen som brukes for hver modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |Edit|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| |Insert|InsertItemTemplate| |Read-only|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| Use the InsertItemTemplate property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Malen gjengis | |----------|-----------------------| | Rediger | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| | Sett inn | InsertItemTemplate | | Skrivebeskyttet | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| Bruk InsertItemTemplate-egenskapen til å definere din egen brukergrensesnittet (UI) for datatypen rad når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The insert item template usually contains the input controls for the user to enter the values for the new record, as well as command buttons to insert the record and to cancel the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Sett inn elementet malen inneholder vanligvis inndata kontrollene for brukeren å angi verdiene for den nye posten, i tillegg til kommandoen knappene til å sette inn en post og avbryte insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template, first place `<InsertItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Angi egendefinert mal, utgangspunktet `<InsertItemTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<InsertItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<InsertItemTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: By using a two-way binding expression, you can associate a field with an input control.
trans-unit.target: Du kan knytte et felt ved hjelp av et uttrykk som toveis binding til en kontroll som inndata.

trans-unit.source: When a record is inserted, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically extracts the field value from the associated input control.
trans-unit.target: Når en post settes den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen trekker automatisk ut feltverdien fra den tilknyttede inndataene kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on two-way binding expressions, see [Binding to Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon på toveis binding uttrykk [Binding til databaser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/ab7b2846-975b-4057-a948-45527497c742).

trans-unit.source: To create command buttons that perform the built-in cancel and insert operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette kommandoknapper som utføre innebygde Avbryt og Sett inn operasjoner, Legg til en kommando for knappekontrollen en mal med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til en av verdiene som vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |Command button type|CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |Cancel|"Cancel"| |Insert|"Insert"| You can control the appearance of the item template by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertRowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Kommandotypen knappen | Verdien for kommandonavn | |-------------------------|-----------------------| | Avbryt | " Avbryt "| | Sett inn | " Sett inn "| Du kan kontrollere utseendet av malen elementet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertRowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertRowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the data row when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder det egendefinerte innholdet for datatypen rad når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when the control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til dataraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollerer når kontrollen er i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: Use the InsertRowStyle property to control the appearance of the data row when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Bruk InsertRowStyle-egenskapen til styrer utseendet av dataene rad når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in insert mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i insert-modus, dataraden viser innholdet brukerdefinerte angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `InsertRowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<InsertRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<InsertRowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `InsertRowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when the control is in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for dataraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollerer når kontrollen er i insert-modus.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified data type can be bound to a field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om angitt datatype kan være bundet til et felt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The IsBindableType method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to determine whether the specified data type can be bound to a field in the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IsBindableType er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen for å finne ut om den angitte datatypen kan være bundet til et felt i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control supports the following data types: - All primitive data types, such as <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int32>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen støtter følgende datatyper: – alle primitive datatypene eksempel <xref:System.Boolean>, <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int32>og så videre.</xref:System.Int32> </xref:System.Byte> </xref:System.Boolean> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.DateTime> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Guid> - <xref:System.String>
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.DateTime> - <xref:System.Decimal> - <xref:System.Guid> - <xref:System.String></xref:System.String></xref:System.Guid></xref:System.Decimal></xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that represents the data type to check.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Type>som representerer datatypen til å kontrollere.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified data type can be bound to a field in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis angitt datatype kan være bundet til et felt i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollere; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCommand event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: ItemCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når en knapp i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: Buttons within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: Knapper i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll kan også aktivere noen av de innebygde funksjonene kontrollens.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: For å utføre en av disse operasjonene, angitt i `CommandName` -egenskapen til en knapp til en av verdiene i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |CommandName value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"Cancel"|Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Verdien for kommandonavn | Beskrivelse | |-----------------------|-----------------| |" Avbryt "| Avbryter en Rediger eller insert-operasjon, og returnerer det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Delete"|Deletes the current record.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>hendelser. | |" Slett "| Sletter oppføringen til gjeldende.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> events.| |"Edit"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>hendelser. | |" Rediger "| Setter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Insert"|Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>hendelser. | |" Sett inn "| Setter inn oppføringen til gjeldende i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> events.| |"New"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>hendelser. | |" Ny "| Setter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Page"|Performs a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>hendelser. | |" Siden "| Utfører en operasjon for Bla.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: Angi den `CommandArgument` for knappen til "Første", "siste", "Neste", "Forrige" eller et tall til å angi hvilken type Bla operasjonen til å utføre.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> events.| |"Update"|Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>hendelser. | |" Oppdateringen "| Oppdaterer gjeldende oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> events.| Although the ItemCommand event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you use the events listed in the table for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>hendelser. | Selv om ItemCommand denne hendelsen oppstår når brukeren klikker en knapp som er oppført i tabellen, anbefales det at du bruker hendelser som er oppført i tabellen for denne operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewCommandEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the command name and command argument of the button clicked.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewCommandEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan finne kommandonavnet og kommando-argument for knappen klikket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the command name and command argument, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne kommandonavnet og kommando-argument, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs.CommandName%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the control that raised the event by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også tilgang til kontrollen som hendelsen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewCommandEventArgs.CommandSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs after all the rows are created in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når alle radene er opprettet i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The ItemCreated event is raised after all rows are created in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: ItemCreated denne hendelsen oppstår når alle rader er opprettet i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This can occur when the control is first rendered, or when the user navigates to another record.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan skje når kontrollen er gjengitt, eller når brukeren navigerer til en annen post.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as adding to or modifying the contents of a row, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne hendelsen til å gi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel legge til eller endring av innholdet i en rad når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ItemCreated event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is bound to data.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For ItemCreated inntreffer før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er bundet til data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To modify the value of a bound field, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound> event.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil endre verdien for et bundet felt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBound>

trans-unit.source: You can access the header, footer, and pager rows in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.TopPagerRow%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til topptekst, bunntekst og personsøker radene i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterRow%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.TopPagerRow%2A>, eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BottomPagerRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.TopPagerRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.FooterRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HeaderRow%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To access the data row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til dataraden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Row%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is clicked, but after the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Slett-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men etter sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the ItemDeleted event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemDeleted-hendelse når en Slett-knapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Delete") i kontrollen klikkes, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen sletter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of a delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontrollere resultatet av en sletting når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å bestemme antall poster som er påvirket, og eventuelle unntak som kan ha oppstått.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the delete operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å fastsette antall poster som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>til å fastslå om unntak oppstod.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i hendelseshåndtering metoden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to access the name/value pairs of the key fields and non-key fields of the deleted record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til navn/verdi-par med feltene nøkkelfelt og ikke er en nøkkel i slettet post, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a Delete button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is clicked, but before the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Slett-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men før sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the ItemDeleting event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemDeleting-hendelse når en Slett-knapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Delete") i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen sletter.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as verifying a record before deleting it, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel en post før du sletter den, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the record being deleted and to indicate that the delete operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen for oppføringen slettes og å angi at sletteoperasjonen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of a record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå indeksen for en oppføring i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.RowIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the delete operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte sletteoperasjonen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also access the key fields and non-key fields by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også gå nøkkelfelt og ikke er en nøkkel felt ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Values%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewDeleteEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is clicked, but after the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Insert-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men etter insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the ItemInserted event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemInserted-hendelse når en Insert-knappen (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Insert") i kontrollen klikkes, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen setter inn oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an insert operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontrollere resultatet av en insert-operasjonen når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å bestemme antall poster som er påvirket, og eventuelle unntak som kan ha oppstått.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the insert operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå antall poster som er berørt av innsetting av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>til å fastslå om unntak oppstod.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i hendelseshåndtering metoden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to access the values of the inserted record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger tilgang til verdiene for innsatte oppføringen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property after an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen returnerer modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>etter at du har en insert-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Skal beholdes i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollere i insert-modus, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertedEventArgs.KeepInInsertMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Insert button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is clicked, but before the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Insert-knapp i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men før insert-operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the ItemInserting event when an Insert button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Insert") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control inserts the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemInserting-hendelse når en Insert-knappen (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Insert") i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen setter inn oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding the values of a record before inserting it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel HTML-koden verdiene i en post før innsetting i datakilden, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control and to indicate that the insert operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å bestemme verdien for en valgfri Kommandoargumentet som er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen og å angi at innsettingsoperasjonen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button.
trans-unit.target: Argumentverdien kommandoen samsvarer med den `CommandArgument` -egenskapen for Insert-knappen.

trans-unit.source: When the `CommandArgument` property of the Insert button is set, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property to determine the value of the command argument.
trans-unit.target: Når den `CommandArgument` -egenskapen for Insert-knappen er angitt, bruker du den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>til å fastslå verdien for Kommandoargumentet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the insert operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte innsettingen, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also read or modify the field values for the new record by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese eller endre feltverdiene for den nye posten ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewInsertEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when the control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte innholdet for dataraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollerer når kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control renders a different template for the data row based on the current mode of the control (specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen gjengir en annen mal for dataraden basert på gjeldende modus for kontrollen (angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which template is used for each mode.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser malen som brukes for hver modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |Edit|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| |Insert|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| |Read-only|ItemTemplate| Use the ItemTemplate property to define your own user interface (UI) for the data row when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Malen gjengis | |----------|-----------------------| | Rediger | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| | Sett inn | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| | Skrivebeskyttet | Elementmalen | Bruk Elementmalen-egenskapen til å definere din egen brukergrensesnittet (UI) for datatypen rad når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The item template usually contains controls to display the field values of a record, as well as command buttons to edit, insert, and delete a record.
trans-unit.target: Elementet malen inneholder vanligvis kontroller for å vise feltverdiene fra en oppføring, i tillegg til kommandoen knappene for å redigere, insert og slette en oppføring.

trans-unit.source: To specify the custom template, first place `<ItemTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Angi egendefinert mal, utgangspunktet `<ItemTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<ItemTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<ItemTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To display the field values of the data source bound to the control, use a data-binding expression.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil vise feltverdiene fra datakilden som er bundet til kontrollen, bruker du databinding uttrykk.

trans-unit.source: For more information on data-binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon på databinding uttrykk i [syntaksen for databinding uttrykk](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca).

trans-unit.source: To create command buttons that perform the built-in delete, edit, and new record operations, add a command button control to the template with its `CommandName` property set to one of the values listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil opprette kommandoknapper som utfører innebygde delete, redigere og nye registrere operasjoner, Legg til en kommando for knappekontrollen en mal med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til en av verdiene som vises i følgende tabell.

trans-unit.source: |Command button type|CommandName value| |-------------------------|-----------------------| |Delete|"Delete"| |Edit|"Edit"| |New|"New"| You can control the appearance of the item template by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.RowStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: | Kommandotypen knappen | Verdien for kommandonavn | |-------------------------|-----------------------| | Slett | " Slett "| | Rediger | " Rediger "| | Ny | " Ny "| Du kan kontrollere utseendet av malen elementet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.RowStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.RowStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the data row when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder det egendefinerte innholdet for datatypen rad når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is clicked, but after the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Oppdater-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men etter oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the ItemUpdated event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemUpdated-hendelse når en Oppdater-knappen (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Oppdatering") i kontrollen klikkes, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppdateringer oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as checking the results of an update operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel kontrollere resultatet av en oppdateringsoperasjon når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the number of records affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å bestemme antall poster som er påvirket, og eventuelle unntak som kan ha oppstått.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of records affected by the update operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å fastsette antall poster som er berørt av oppdateringen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether any exceptions occurred.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>til å fastslå om unntak oppstod.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also indicate whether the exception was handled in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også angi om unntaket ble behandlet i hendelseshåndtering metoden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to access the key field values for the updated record, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger tilgang til nøkkelen feltverdiene for den oppdaterte posten, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The original and updated non-key field values can be accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Kan få tilgang til de opprinnelige og oppdaterte uten nøkkel feltverdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property after an update operation.
trans-unit.target: Som standard i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen returnerer modusen som er angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>egenskapen etter en oppdateringsoperasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To keep the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Vil beholde den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollere i redigeringsmodus, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.KeepInEditMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an Update button within a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is clicked, but before the update operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når en Oppdater-knappen i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen klikkes, men før oppdateringen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the ItemUpdating event when an Update button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Update") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control updates the record.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøyer ItemUpdating-hendelse når en Oppdater-knappen (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Oppdatering") i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppdateringer oppføringen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as HTML encoding the values of a record before updating it in the data source, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel HTML-koden verdiene i en post før du oppdaterer i datakilden, når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the value of an optional command argument sent to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control and to indicate that the update operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å bestemme verdien for en valgfri Kommandoargumentet som er sendt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen og å angi at oppdateringen bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The command argument value corresponds to the `CommandArgument` property of the Update button.
trans-unit.target: Argumentverdien kommandoen samsvarer med den `CommandArgument` for Oppdater-knappen.

trans-unit.source: When the `CommandArgument` property of the Update button is set, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A> property to determine the value of the command argument.
trans-unit.target: Når den `CommandArgument` for Oppdater-knappen er angitt, bruker du den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>til å fastslå verdien for Kommandoargumentet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.CommandArgument%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the update operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte oppdateringen, kan du angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also read or modify the new values entered by the user by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese eller endre de nye verdiene som er angitt av brukeren ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A> property contains the key fields, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> property contains the non-key fields.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen inneholder nøkkelfelt, mens den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A>egenskapen inneholder feltene ikke er en nøkkel.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.NewValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdateEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to access the original non-key field values, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du trenger tilgang til de opprinnelige verdiene for ikke-nøkkelfelt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewUpdatedEventArgs.OldValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Loads the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control properties that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollegenskapene som skal beholdes, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*>er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState*>

trans-unit.source: The LoadControlState method is used to load the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control properties that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadControlState brukes til å laste statusen til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollegenskapene som skal beholdes, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer statusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Laster inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden LoadViewState brukes til å laste inn tidligere lagret visningsstatusen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når utvider den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som representerer statusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control switches between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the mode has changed.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollere bytter mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men når modusen er endret.

trans-unit.source: The ModeChanged event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but after the mode actually changes.
