trans-unit.target: ModeChanged denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen forsøk på å bytte mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men når modusen endres faktisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as synchronizing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control with another control, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel synkronisering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll med andre kontroller, når denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control switches between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode changes.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollere bytter mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men før endringene modus.

trans-unit.source: The ModeChanging event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control attempts to switch between edit, insert, and read-only mode, but before the mode actually changes.
trans-unit.target: ModeChanging denne hendelsen oppstår når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen forsøk på å bytte mellom Rediger, insert og skrivebeskyttet modus, men før modusen endres faktisk.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as configuring the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control for a specific mode or canceling the mode change, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette lar deg angi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel konfigurering av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer for en bestemt modus eller avbryte endringen modus når denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the mode to which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is switching, to determine whether the ModeChanging event was raised as a result of the user canceling an edit operation, or to indicate that an insert operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, slik at du kan finne modus som i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er bytter til å bestemme om ModeChanging hendelsen ble opp som et resultat av brukeren avbryter en redigeringsoperasjonen, eller angi en insert-operasjonen kan avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the new mode, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne den nye modusen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A> property to switch to an alternate mode by setting it to one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>til å bytte til en alternativ modus ved å sette verdien til en av de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode>nummereringsverdier.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.NewMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A> property to determine whether the user canceled an edit operation.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>til å fastslå om brukeren avbrøt en redigeringsoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewModeEventArgs.CancelingEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel an insert operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte en insert-operasjonen, kan du angi den <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the table-specific CSS style rules that are associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control are set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om CSS-stil for tabell-spesifikke regler som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er satt til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: The table-specific CSS style rules are set to their default values by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BackImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.GridLines%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HorizontalAlign%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Tabell-spesifikke CSS-stil reglene er satt til standardverdiene ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BackImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.GridLines%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HorizontalAlign%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.Font%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.HorizontalAlign%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.GridLines%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellSpacing%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CellPadding%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.BackImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default CSS style rules that are associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: CSS-stil standardreglene som er tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Handles an event passed up through the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Behandler en hendelse sendt gjennom kontrollhierarki.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is used by the control to optionally handle events passed up through the control hierarchy by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden brukes av kontrollen til å håndtere eventuelt hendelser som er sendt via kontrollen hierarkiet som den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RaiseBubbleEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnBubbleEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: It determines whether to handle an event by examining the properties of the <xref:System.EventArgs> object contained in the `e` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den bestemmer om å behandle en hendelse ved å kontrollere egenskapene for den <xref:System.EventArgs>objekt i den `e` parameteren.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When an event needs to be handled, the method performs the appropriate action.
trans-unit.target: Når en hendelse må håndteres, utfører metoden riktig handling.

trans-unit.source: Other events are ignored and passed up the control hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: Andre hendelser ignoreres og sendt kontroll-hierarkiet.

trans-unit.source: This method indicates whether to pass the event further up the control hierarchy through its return value.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden angir om å sende hendelsen du kontrollen hierarkiet via returverdien.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control overrides the base implementation of this method to perform the appropriate action when one of the buttons recognized by the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen overstyrer base implementeringen av denne metoden til å utføre de nødvendige handlingene når en av knappene gjenkjent kontrollen klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the command buttons that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control recognizes.
trans-unit.target: Følgende tabell lister kommandoen knapper som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen gjenkjenner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: |Button|CommandName value|Description| |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| |Cancel|"Cancel"|Used in updating or inserting operations to cancel the operation and to discard the values entered by the user.
trans-unit.target: | Knappen | Verdien for kommandonavn | Beskrivelse | |------------|-----------------------|-----------------| | Avbryt | " Avbryt "| Brukes i oppdatering eller innsetting operasjoner å avbryte operasjonen og forkaste verdiene som er angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control then returns to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.| |Delete|"Delete"|Used in deleting operations to delete the displayed record from the data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>Kontrollere deretter går tilbake til modusen som er angitt av egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>. | | Slett | " Slett "| Brukes under sletting av operasjoner slette posten som vises fra datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> events.| |Edit|"Edit"|Used in updating operations to put the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>hendelser. | | Rediger | " Rediger "| Brukes i oppdatering operasjoner for å sette den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i redigeringsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>

trans-unit.source: The content specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A> property is displayed for the data row.| |Insert|"Insert"|Used in inserting operations to attempt to insert a new record in the data source with the values provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet som er angitt i egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>vises for dataraden. | | Sett inn | " Sett inn "| Brukt i innsetting operasjoner under forsøk på å sette inn en ny post i datakilden med verdier angitt av brukeren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> events.| |New|"New"|Used in inserting operations to put the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>hendelser. | | Ny | " Ny "| Brukes i innsetting operasjoner for å sette den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i insert-modus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>

trans-unit.source: The content specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> property is displayed for the data row.| |Page|"Page"|Used in paging operations to represent a button in the pager row that performs paging.
trans-unit.target: Innholdet som er angitt i egenskapen <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>vises for dataraden. | | Siden | " Siden "| Brukes til å representere en knapp i raden personsøker som utfører bla i sidevekslingsoperasjoner.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the paging operation, set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "Next", "Prev", "First", "Last", or the index of the page to which to navigate.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi Bla-operasjonen, angitt i `CommandArgument` -egenskapen for knappen "Neste", "Forrige", "Første", "Siste" eller indeksen for siden du vil navigere.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>

trans-unit.source: **Note:** This type of button is typically used only in the pager template.| |Update|"Update"|Used in updating operations to attempt to update the displayed record in the data source with the values provided by the user.
trans-unit.target: **Obs!** denne typen knappen brukes vanligvis bare i malen personsøker. | | Oppdateringen | " Oppdateringen "| Brukt under oppdatering av operasjoner under forsøk på å oppdatere posten som vises i datakilden med verdier angitt av brukeren.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> events.| This version of the method returns `true` when one of these buttons is handled.
trans-unit.target: Hever <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>hendelser. | Denne versjonen av metoden returnerer `true` når en av disse knappene håndteres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>

trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data brukeren ikke Avbryt oppdateringen og hendelsesbehandling er ikke registrert for hendelsen.

trans-unit.target: Metoden OnModeChanged kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøye den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The OnModeChanged method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Metoden OnModeChanged kan også avledede klasser behandle hendelsen uten å knytte representant.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Dette er den foretrukne metoden for behandling av hendelsen i en avledet klasse.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs"> </xref> som inneholder hendelsesdataene.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is not bound to a data source control, the paging operation was not canceled, and an event handler is not registered for the event.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke bundet til en kilde-kontroll for data, bla operasjonen ikke ble avbrutt og hendelsesbehandling er ikke registrert for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Henter det totale antallet sider som kreves for å vise alle poster i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`), use the PageCount property to determine the total number of records in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Når funksjonen Bla er aktivert (når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>er satt til `true`), bruke egenskapen PageCount til å avgjøre Totalt antall poster i den underliggende datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control displays only one record at a time, this value corresponds to the total number of pages required to display every record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Fordi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen viser bare én post om gangen, denne verdien som tilsvarer det totale antallet sider som kreves for å vise alle poster i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This value is not accurate until after data-binding occurs.
trans-unit.target: Denne verdien er ikke nøyaktig før etter databinding forekommer.

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the current record from the underlying data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne indeksen for oppføringen til gjeldende fra den underliggende datakilden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Antall elementer i den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the index of the displayed page.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir indeksen for den viste siden.

trans-unit.source: When the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`), use the PageIndex property to determine the index of the currently displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Når funksjonen Bla er aktivert (når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>er satt til `true`), bruke egenskapen PageIndex til å bestemme indeksen for posten som for øyeblikket vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use this property to programmatically change the displayed record.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også bruke denne egenskapen til å endre programmatisk posten som vises.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the paging feature is enabled, you can also use this property to determine the page number of the record displayed; however, be aware that this property is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert, kan du også bruke denne egenskapen siden antall oppføringen vises; imidlertid Vær oppmerksom på at denne egenskapen nullbasert.

trans-unit.source: To determine the total number of items in the data source, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å avgjøre Totalt antall elementer i datakilden, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageCount%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the data item being displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control from the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen for dataelement som vises i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen fra den underliggende datakilden.

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than -1.
trans-unit.target: Den valgte verdien er mindre enn -1.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex*> property changes after a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex*>egenskapsendringer etter en Bla-operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the PageIndexChanged event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøyer PageIndexChanged-hendelse når en Personsøkerknapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Siden") i kontrollen klikkes, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når du angir programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Personsøker knappene vanligvis finnes i raden personsøker for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This event is often used to synchronize a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control or to set the behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control after a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Denne hendelsen er ofte brukes til å synkronisere en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>styre med en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>kontrollen eller til å angi virkemåten for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen etter en Bla-operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex*> property changes before a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Forekommer når verdien for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex*>egenskapsendringer før en Bla-operasjon.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control raises the PageIndexChanging event when a pager button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Page") within the control is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control handles the paging operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen opphøyer PageIndexChanging-hendelse når en Personsøkerknapp (en knapp med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Siden") i kontrollen klikkes, men før den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen behandler Bla-operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the paging operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine, for eksempel avbryte operasjonen Bla når denne hendelsen oppstår.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This event is not raised when you programmatically set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne hendelsen oppstår ikke når du angir programmatisk den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Pager buttons are usually located in the pager row of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Personsøker knappene vanligvis finnes i raden personsøker for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the page selected by the user and to indicate that the paging operation should be canceled.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs>objekt som er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden, som gjør det mulig å finne ut indeksen på siden som er valgt av brukeren og å angi at operasjonen Bla bør avbrytes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To determine the index of the page selected by the user, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å finne ut indeksen på siden som er valgt av brukeren, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs.NewPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: To cancel the paging operation, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil avbryte operasjonen Bla, angitt i <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>-egenskapen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs>objekt `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewPageEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om behandling av hendelser [NIB: bruker hendelser](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"></xref> object that allows you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"> </xref> objektet der du kan angi egenskaper for knappene personsøker i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the PagerSettings property to control the settings of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PagerSettings-egenskapen for å kontrollere innstillingene for personsøker rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different records in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker vises når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>er satt til `true`), og inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til annen oppføringene i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings> object (for example, `PagerSettings-Mode`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>objektet (for eksempel `PagerSettings-Mode`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerSettings.Mode`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `PagerSettings.Mode`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include the pager row's display mode and custom text or images for the navigation controls.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger inkluderer vanligvis raden personsøker visningsmodus og egendefinert tekst eller bilder for Sidenavigeringskontrollene vises.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"></xref> that allows you to set the properties of the pager buttons in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerSettings"> </xref> som lar deg angi egenskapene for knappene personsøker i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the PagerStyle property to control the appearance of the pager row in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk PagerStyle-egenskapen for å kontrollere utseendet til personsøker rad i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row is displayed when the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`), and contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker vises når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>er satt til `true`), og inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til forskjellige sider i kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `PagerStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `PagerStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest a `<PagerRowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<PagerRowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `PagerStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `PagerStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom content for the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte innholdet for personsøker rad i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: A pager row is displayed in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control when the paging feature is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to true).
trans-unit.target: En personsøker rad vises i en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer når Bla-funksjonen er aktivert (når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>-egenskap er satt til true).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains the controls that allow the user to navigate to the different pages in the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontrollene som tillater brukeren å navigere til forskjellige sider i kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the built-in pager row user interface (UI), you can define your own UI by using the PagerTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for innebygde personsøker rad-brukergrensesnittet (UI), kan du definere din egen Brukergrensesnittet ved hjelp av egenskapen PagerTemplate.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the PagerTemplate property is set it overrides the built-in pager row UI.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når det PagerTemplate settes den overstyrer raden innebygde personsøker Brukergrensesnittet.

trans-unit.source: To specify a custom template for the pager row, first place `<PagerTemplate>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi en egendefinert mal for raden personsøker først plasseres `<PagerTemplate>` koder mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: You can then list the contents of the template between the opening and closing `<PagerTemplate>` tags.
trans-unit.target: Du kan deretter liste opp innholdet i malen mellom innledende og avsluttende `<PagerTemplate>` koder.

trans-unit.source: To control the appearance of the pager row, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Egendefinere radverdiene personsøker, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerStyle%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PagerStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, button controls are added to the pager template to perform the paging operations.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis er kontrollene lagt til personsøker malen til å utføre sidevekslingsoperasjoner.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control performs a paging operation when a button control with its `CommandName` property set to "Page" is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen utfører en operasjon for Bla når knappekontrollen med den `CommandName` egenskapen satt til "Siden" klikkes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The button's `CommandArgument` property determines the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen `CommandArgument` egenskapen bestemmer hvilken type Bla å utføre operasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the command argument values supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser kommandoen argumentverdier som støttes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: |CommandArgument value|Description| |---------------------------|-----------------| |"Next"|Navigates to the next page.| |"Prev"|Navigates to the previous page.| |"First"|Navigates to the first page.| |"Last"|Navigates to the last page.| |Integer value|Navigates to the specified page number.|
trans-unit.target: | Verdien for CommandArgument | Beskrivelse | |---------------------------|-----------------| |" Neste "| Går til neste side. | |" Forrige "| Går til forrige side. | |" Første "| Går til den første siden. | |" Siste "| Navigerer til den siste siden. | | Heltallsverdien | Går til det angitte tallet. |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"></xref> that contains the custom content for the pager row.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.ITemplate"> </xref> som inneholder det egendefinerte innholdet for personsøker rad.

trans-unit.source: The default value is null, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null, noe som angir at denne egenskapen ikke er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Binds the specified data source to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Binding den angitte datakilden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PerformDataBinding er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen skal bindes den angitte datakilden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> that represents the data source.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>som representerer datakilden.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: Sets up the control hierarchy of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir kontrollen hierarkiet med den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The PrepareControlHierarchy method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to set up the control hierarchy in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control before the control is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Metoden PrepareControlHierarchy er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen for å angi kontrollen hierarkiet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollerer før kontrollen gjengis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the appropriate events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer de aktuelle hendelsene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The page calls the RaisePostBackEvent method when a postback event occurs that raises the appropriate events for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Siden kaller RaisePostBackEvent metoden når det oppstår en sende tilbake hendelse som starter de nødvendige hendelsene for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before prerendering occurs.
trans-unit.target: Kallet oppstår i livssyklusen siden etter innlasting og endre varsel er fullført, men før prerendering forekommer.

trans-unit.source: This method has been implemented to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs> object for the events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden er implementert for å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>objekt for hendelsene som aktiveres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The event argument from which to create a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"></xref> for the event or events that are raised.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet hendelsen å opprette en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs"> </xref> hendelsen eller hendelser som aktiveres.

trans-unit.source: Displays the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control on the client.
trans-unit.target: Viser den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontroll på klienten.

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used to render the server control content to the client's browser using the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> object.
trans-unit.target: Metoden gjengivelse brukes til å gjengi server kontrollinnholdet til klientleseren parametersettet med de angitte <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>objektet.</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> som inneholder utdata dataflyten å gjengi på klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control encloses rendered HTML in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element in order to apply inline styles.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om kontrollen omslutter gjengitte HTML i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref> element for å kunne bruke innebygde stiler.

trans-unit.source: In order to make inline style properties such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> apply to all the HTML that is rendered for the control, ASP.NET encloses the rendered HTML in a `table` element.
trans-unit.target: For å gjøre innebygde stilegenskaper eksempel <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>gjelder for alle HTML gjengis for kontrollen, ASP.NET omslutter gjengitte HTML i en `table` element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not want the outer `table` element to be rendered, set this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke vil ytterste `table` elementet som skal gjengis, settes denne egenskapen til `false`.

trans-unit.source: In that case, if you try to set inline style properties that apply to the whole control, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet hvis du prøver å angi innebygd stilegenskaper som gjelder for hele kontrollen, unntak et.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control encloses rendered HTML in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""></xref> element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis kontrollen omslutter gjengitte HTML i en <xref uid="langword_csharp_table" name="table" href=""> </xref> elementet; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object that represents the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer dataraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Row property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the data row.
trans-unit.target: Bruk rad-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet som representerer dataraden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: The data row contains different content based on the template rendered for the current mode (specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Dataraden har forskjellige innhold basert på mal gjengis for gjeldende modus (angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>egenskapen).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.CurrentMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can only access the contents of the template for the current mode.
trans-unit.target: Du får bare tilgang til innholdet i malen for gjeldende modus.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows which template is used for each mode.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser malen som brukes for hver modus.

trans-unit.source: |Mode|Template rendered| |----------|-----------------------| |Edit|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| |Insert|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| |Read-only|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| > [!NOTE] > The Row property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control creates the data row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: | Modus | Malen gjengis | |----------|-----------------------| | Rediger | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>| | Sett inn | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A>| | Skrivebeskyttet | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>| > [!NOTE] > I rad-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppretter dataraden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.InsertItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.EditItemTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the data row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk dataraden, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the Row property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has been data-bound; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control overwrites any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i rad-egenskapen må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er bundet til data; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen overskriver endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> that represents the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> som representerer dataraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when the control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter en referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> objektet som lar deg angi utseendet til dataraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollerer når kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: Use the RowStyle property to control the appearance of the data row when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only (display) mode.
trans-unit.target: Bruk RowStyle-egenskapen til styrer utseendet av dataene rad når en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet () visningsmodus.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in read-only mode, the data row displays the user-defined content specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus, dataraden viser innholdet brukerdefinerte angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er skrivebeskyttet. Du kan imidlertid angi egenskapene for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objekt returneres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively using one of the following methods: - Place an attribute in the opening tag of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> object (for example, `RowStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Kan angi egenskaper deklarativt ved hjelp av én av følgende metoder:-plassere et attributt i åpningskoden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen i formatet `Property-Subproperty`, der `Subproperty` er en egenskap for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle>objektet (for eksempel `RowStyle-ForeColor`).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: - Nest an `<RowStyle>` element between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: -Neste en `<RowStyle>` elementet mellom innledende og avsluttende koder for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RowStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapene du kan også angi programmatisk formatet `Property.Subproperty` (for eksempel `RowStyle.ForeColor`).

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, and font properties.
trans-unit.target: Felles innstillinger er vanligvis en egendefinert bakgrunnsfarge, forgrunnsfarge og skriftegenskaper.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the data row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when the control is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: En referanse til det <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle"> </xref> som representerer stilen for dataraden i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollerer når kontrollen er i skrivebeskyttet modus.

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control properties that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollegenskapene som skal beholdes, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> er satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to save the state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control properties that need to be persisted, even when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å lagre tilstanden til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollegenskapene som skal beholdes, selv når den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til `false`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.EnableViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne metoden brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere for å utvide den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer den serverkontroll gjeldende visningsstatus.

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er ingen visningsstatusen som er knyttet til kontrollen metoden returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Saves the current view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Lagrer gjeldende visningsstatusen for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The SaveViewState method is a helper method called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to save the state of the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden SaveViewState er en helper kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen ikke lagre tilstanden til kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that contains the saved state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Object>som inneholder den lagrede tilstanden til den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontroll.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the data key value of the current record in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter data nøkkelverdi gjeldende oppføring i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control automatically creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object that contains the key/value pairs of the field or fields listed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property for the current record.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppretter automatisk et <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objekt som inneholder nøkkel/verdi-par med feltet eller feltene som er oppført i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>for gjeldende posten.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey> object represents the primary key field or fields for the current record and is stored in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>objektet representerer felt eller felt i gjeldende post og lagres i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>

trans-unit.source: Instead of using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A> property to access the data key value, you can use the SelectedValue property as a shortcut.
trans-unit.target: I stedet for å bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A>å få tilgang til data nøkkelverdien du kan bruke egenskapen SelectedValue som en snarvei.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKey%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A> property lists multiple fields, this property returns the value of the first field listed.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>egenskapslister flere felt, returnerer verdien for det første feltet for denne egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DataKeyNames%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data key value of the current record in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Dataene for verdien for gjeldende oppføring i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Sets the index of the currently displayed page in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Angir indeksen for siden som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The index to set.
trans-unit.target: Indeksen til å angi.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the display index.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som representerer indeksen for visningen.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse for dette medlemmet under <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Dette medlemmet er implementering eksplisitt grensesnitt medlem.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: Den kan brukes bare når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>forekomsten endres til en <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Always returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid 0.

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control when it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Opphøyer hendelser for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollerer når den legger inn på serveren.

trans-unit.source: The page calls the IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent method when a postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Siden kaller metoden IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent når sende tilbake hendelsen inntreffer.

trans-unit.source: This call occurs in the page life cycle after loading and change notification are complete, but before the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: Kallet oppstår i livssyklusen siden etter innlasting og endre hendelsesvarslingen er fullført, men før siden gjengis.

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: Argumentet for hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array that contains the names of the primary-key fields of the items that are displayed in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en matrise som inneholder feltnavn i primærnøkkelen av elementene som vises i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.target: Gjeldende modus for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Determines the postback event options for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer sende tilbake hendelsen alternativene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The IPostBackContainer.GetPostBackOptions method is a helper method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to create a <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object that contains the postback event options for the control.
trans-unit.target: Metoden IPostBackContainer.GetPostBackOptions er en hjelper som kalles av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen til å opprette en <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>objekt som inneholder alternativene sende tilbake hendelsen for kontrollen.</xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions> object is typically used as a parameter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>objektet brukes vanligvis som en parameter for den <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetPostBackEventReference%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.PostBackOptions>

trans-unit.source: The button control that posted the page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Knappekontrollen posteres siden tilbake til serveren.

trans-unit.source: The postback event options for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Sende tilbake hendelsen alternativer for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The object contained in the buttonControl parameter is .
trans-unit.target: Objektet i den buttonControl parameteren er .

trans-unit.target: The property of buttonControl is .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"></xref> value for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag"> </xref> verdi den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The TagKey property allows the output stream to write the appropriate HTML markup for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen TagKey tillater utdata dataflyten å skrive riktig HTML-koden for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" name="HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" name="HtmlTextWriterTag.Table" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> object that represents the pager row displayed at the top of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> objektet som representerer raden personsøker vises øverst i en <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled (when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A> property is set to `true`), an additional row called the pager row is automatically displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Når Bla er aktivert (når det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>er satt til `true`), vises automatisk en ekstra rad kalt personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.AllowPaging%2A>

trans-unit.source: The pager row contains controls that allow the user to navigate to other records, and can be displayed at the top, the bottom, or both the top and bottom of the control.
trans-unit.target: Raden personsøker inneholder kontroller som tillater brukeren å navigere til andre oppføringer, og kan vises på toppen, nederst eller både toppen og bunnen av kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use the TopPagerRow property to programmatically access the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow> object that represents the top pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk TopPagerRow-egenskapen for å programmatisk tilgang av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>objektet som representerer den øverste personsøker raden i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The TopPagerRow property is available only after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control creates the top pager row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> event.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > I TopPagerRow-egenskapen er tilgjengelig etter at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen oppretter øverste personsøker rad i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCreated> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when you need to programmatically manipulate the top pager row, for example when adding custom content.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis når du skal endre programmatisk raden øverste personsøker, for eksempel når du legger til egendefinert innhold.

trans-unit.source: Any modification to the TopPagerRow property must be performed after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control has been bound to data; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control overwrites any changes.
trans-unit.target: Endringer i egenskapen TopPagerRow må utføres etter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er bundet til data; motsatt fall, av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen overskriver endringer.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"></xref> that represents the top pager row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormViewRow"> </xref> som representerer den øverste personsøker raden i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Marks the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Merker startpunktet vil begynne å spore og lagre visningsstatus endringer i den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This method is overridden to mark the starting point at which to begin tracking and saving changes to the control as part of the control's view state.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyres for å merke startpunkt ved å begynne å spore og lagre endringene til kontrollen som en del av kontrollens visningsstatusen.

trans-unit.source: Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer gjeldende oppføring i datakilden.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is in edit mode, use the UpdateItem method to programmatically update the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen er i redigeringsmodus, bruker du UpdateItem-metoden til å oppdatere programmatisk gjeldende oppføring i datakilden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used when you need to update the current record from outside of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control, such as from a different control on the page.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes vanligvis når du trenger å oppdatere oppføringen til gjeldende fra utenfor den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollere, for eksempel fra en annen kontroll på siden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control must be in edit mode when this method is called; otherwise, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>kontrollen må være i redigeringsmodus når denne metoden er kall; ellers, en <xref:System.Web.HttpException>forårsakes.</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To specify whether page validation is performed before the update operation, use the `causesValidation` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil angi om siden valideringen utføres før oppdateringen, kan du bruke den `causesValidation` parameteren.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method also raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> events.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden også hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>hendelser.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to perform page validation when the method is called; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til å utføre siden når metoden kalles; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is not in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles når den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er ikke i redigeringsmodus.

trans-unit.source: -or- The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control is null.
trans-unit.target: - eller - <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref> tilknyttet den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"> </xref> kontrollen er null.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an update operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en oppdateringsoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: For a tutorial series on using model binding with Web Forms, see [Model Binding and Web Forms](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).
trans-unit.target: For en opplæring serie på ved hjelp av modellen binding med webskjema, kan du se [modellen bindingen og webskjema](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=286117).

trans-unit.source: The name of the method on the page that is called when the control performs an update operation.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på metoden på siden som kalles når kontrollen utfører en oppdateringsoperasjon.
